name: Apache (itch) (IENT)
description:
Apache Longbow  is a successful Legacy game of iEntertainment Network

Take command of your own U.S. Army AH-64D Apache Longbow, and use the mechanical menace to take out tanks, enemy aircraft, and other destructible items in simulated environments. Complete with realistic Apache weapon systems such as specialized black box avionics and radar guided infrared missile defenses
